description:
Nico and Morihito’s living situation filled with "grim prospects" begins, but for Morihito, an even greater challenge awaits him. That`s right, Morihito and Nico both enrolled in Asunaro Private High School. They`re both in the same class, but Morihito pushes Nico to hide the fact that she`s a witch. But when Nico tries to sneakily use magic to save Morihito, she may have accidentally spilled all the beans!
Source: Crunchyroll
